Sentencas: The La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-delta (LSCM) catalyst and the novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-delta composite were investigated as alternative anodes for the direct utilization of propane in anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ catalysts for propane reforming in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: In particular, their synthesis and performance in direct propane reforming were studied.
Titulo: Novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ catalysts for propane reforming in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The LSCM powders were prepared by a sol-gel method based on a modified Pechini procedure.
Titulo: Novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ catalysts for propane reforming in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Single-phase LSCM perovskite powders were obtained.
Titulo: Novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ catalysts for propane reforming in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: SEM micrographs of the LSCM powders revealed particles in the 200-300 nm range with a homogeneous grain distribution.
Titulo: Novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ catalysts for propane reforming in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The deposition of 5 wt.% metallic ruthenium nanoparticles on the LSCM perovskite powders was carried out by a microwave-assisted procedure.
Titulo: Novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ catalysts for propane reforming in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: TEM investigations of Ru/LSCM composites showed a homogeneous distribution of metallic ruthenium nanoparticles with a mean grain size of around 2-3 nm.
Titulo: Novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ catalysts for propane reforming in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The catalytic activity of these potential anode materials was investigated for the following propane reforming processes: steam reforming (SR), autothermal reforming (ATR) and partial oxidation (POX) at 600,700 and 800 degrees C. Very high propane conversion rates were observed under POX and ATR conditions at 700 and 800 degrees C for both the LSCM and Ru/LSCM compounds (>92 at 700 degrees C and >98% at 800 degrees C), whereas in the steam reforming environment, a satisfactory conversion was achieved only at 800 degrees C. The ruthenium presence was found to strongly improve the selectivity for H-2 and syngas production for all of the experiments performed, reaching an approximately 90% syngas yield.
Titulo: Novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ catalysts for propane reforming in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Finally, good chemical stability after the catalytic tests was demonstrated for the LSCM and Ru/LSCM anode materials.
Titulo: Novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ catalysts for propane reforming in IT-SOFCs
Novel Ru/La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ catalysts for propane reforming in IT-SOFCs
